text: Jamia Islamia Ishaatul Uloom is an Islamic school based in Nandurbar district, Maharashtra, India. It began in 1979 in Akkalkuwa as an Islamic school in a single hut with only six students, and by 2014 grew to two lakh students across India.http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Vastanvi-a-success- story-in-Maharashtra-town/articleshow/7383224.cms Medical College & Noor Hospital received permission from the state government and the final permission from Medical Council of India, New Delhi, to start the M.B.B.S. course, in the year 2013, and 100 students have been enrolled to the course. Besides the MBBS College, Jamia has 300-bed available hospital where all kinds of surgical operations are carried out along with checkups, treatments, medicines, all kind of pathology, biochemistry, microbiology investigation, X-Ray, sonography and all offered facilities freely. There are around 600 OPD and 230 IPD patients benefit daily. Doctors daily perform around 30 operations including all departments.http://www.milligazette.com/news/8944-maharashtra- first-minority-medical-college-recognised-by-mci. ==References== ==Further reading== *http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/darul-uloom-deoband-vastanvi- modi-remarks/1/145985.html *http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Vastanvi- to-focus-on-Rs100cr-college/articleshow/9352071.cms *http://www.nytimes.com/2011/03/21/world/asia/21cleric.html?pagewanted=all&_r=0 *http://article.wn.com/view/2013/10/11/For_Modi_Dilli_door_hai_Maulana_Ghulam_Mohammad_Vastanvi_say/ *http://archive.financialexpress.com/news/why-akkalkuwa-its-students-are- rooting-for-bade-hazrat/743844 *http://www.tribuneindia.com/2011/20110131/main7.htm *http://archive.indianexpress.com/news/-vastanvi-never-praised-modi-he-had-to- go-as-he-was-not-from-that-region-/821862/ Category:Islamic schools in India Category:Schools in Maharashtra Category:Nandurbar district Category:Educational institutions established in 1979 Category:1979 establishments in India
title: Jamia Islamia Ishaatul Uloom
